summary: WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS PURCHASED NEW THE CONSUMER NOTICED THAT THE OUTSIDE REAR VIEW MIRRORS HAD BLACK LINES AND SPECKS IN THEM.  THE DEALER INDICATED THAT ALL THE VEHICLES WERE LIKE THAT.  NOW, SOME YEARS LATER, THE BLACK FILM ON THE BACK OF THE GLASS STARTED WRINKLING AND THE BLACK SPECKS BECAME WORSE.  THIS DEFECT HAS CAUSED POOR VISIBILITY.  *AK  *PH  *NLM
